article: colombo , november # -lrb- xinhua -rrb- -- sri lankan troops massing at the gate of jaffna town , the stronghold of rebel liberation tigers of tamil eelam -lrb- ltte -rrb- , are clearing minefields and preparing final operation to capture the town , defense sources said today .
abstract: sri lankan troops clear minefields for advance
